description.narrative: The program will provide budget support during the country's fiscal consolidation process for reforms to (i) improve fiscal policy management, and (ii) develop policies and regulations to support targeting and consolidation of social welfare programs. Through these reforms, the program will help sustain financing for social welfare programs.
